title: That moment when the enemy stops moving in lane vs Top lane Heim..
body:
And you know they're crying to the jungler. Pleading for a gank, a gank that either never comes, or comes post-6 when the inevitable double kill happens. 

Is it bad I get satisfaction when I see them typing to their jungle? =(

replies.body: I love playing Donger, just because the jungler tries SO hard to gank you. C'mon people, you should know by now you can't gank Donger.

{{champion:41}} ez

shoot the turrets 
cleanse the stuns
ult the entire donger HQ

and jungler comes in for a gank :O
Good luck with that, as I exaust, E, W, and then R+Q you with a full AP build xD

tell me more about the "full" ap you got at lvl6

oh shit, I almost got lured into another "hypothetical scenario fight on the internet"
welp fk you and good night

Lmao, by level 6 with Donger I usually have like 3k gold (but I don't back until lvl 8) to buy half the build anyway. And {{item:3089}} +{{item:3157}} makes his W hurt like a truck. I've been level 6 with just those items, and landing a W on an enemy makes them either run, or they'll just give me a free kill.

But I was never referring to "at level 6", no one stated a level.

Had a fight of my life as Talon vs Donger, We had a Nunu jungler so I asked him to just come in from time to time just to eat those turrets. Focused on killing turrets and once I got a kill on him I was good. 



It was a satisfying win.


Alot of people don't know this, but kill the fucking turrets as soon as you can. I knew I was facing him so I just rushed to the lane and started killing them as he placed them.
Donger relies on stupidity, if your opponent is either: Arrogant, newer, unfamiliar, or a flamer, you'll win as Donger.
If the enemy laner can't clear the turrets
Which they usually can't if you harass them enough with your W. And even then, if your R is up, just R+Q, and W+E and run around in your turret's range avoiding them.

Idunno, even as Yasuo I could clear with just my tornados.

I mean I can see how a lot of tops can't (poor Trundle) but those who can can certainly clear for ganks.

last time i stopped to type while laning against a heimer, i was just reflecting on life while farming Q stacks as nasus... quickly turned sour for the donger

dunno why, i never had much trouble against heimer, even as darius back when heim's 3 turrets would refresh on each new charge

Turrers?
{{champion:14}} FUS RO DAH
{{champion:14}} What turrets?

But as any one else (Not counting Syndra ~~or Tottally balanced Annie ~~) it reakly suks to try and gank a heimer.
